channel.title: Need a good [Pi] source and client help
channel.description:
Can someone recommend a good [Pi] source and client?
Also I need a source and client that is 317, but loads 508 or 525 does anyone know of a good one?

item.title: Need a good [Pi] source and client help
item.dc:creator: @brandonscarinfo brandonscarinfo
item.description:
@brandonscarinfo wrote:

[quote=“mikirune, post:10, topic:377951”][quote author=brandonscarinfo link=topic=473833.msg3466138#msg3466138 date=1294905354]

client.java i believe.

Thanks, I’m quite new

that is quite alright i was new too, unfortunately I hadn’t read rules and I slightly upset people by asking too much so I got minus repped 6 times, a very nice person however repped me for good help
[/quote]
Ill rep you because you helped a nooby like me. Thanks a ton and Youll see more of me in the future hopefully[/quote]

No problem, just ask for help anytime, I’ll see what I can do ;D

@off topic. A very nice person repped me 13 times for help

Read full topic

item.title: Need a good [Pi] source and client help
item.dc:creator: @brandonscarinfo brandonscarinfo
item.source: Need a good [Pi] source and client help

item.title: Need a good [Pi] source and client help
item.dc:creator: @mikirune mikirune
item.description:
@mikirune wrote:

[quote=“brandonscarinfo, post:5, topic:377951”][quote author=mikirune link=topic=473833.msg3464730#msg3464730 date=1294800470]
I tried Sagi and I like it but the only I dont like is the messages u get throughout the game like when u tele home it says talk to the mage of zammy and there isnt one and idk how to get rid of it any suggestions?
[/quote]

its in src>server>model>players>packets>ClickingButtons.java

hope i helped

I went to my computer and found it for you, that is what you are looking for I believe :P[/quote]

Thank you very much. It got rid of that problem. Now is it possible to customize the login message? I mean this sounds nooby, but I am new and need some help. Thank you.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a good [Pi] source and client help

item.title: Need a good [Pi] source and client help
item.dc:creator: @brandonscarinfo brandonscarinfo
item.description:
@brandonscarinfo wrote:

mikirune:

I tried Sagi and I like it but the only I dont like is the messages u get throughout the game like when u tele home it says talk to the mage of zammy and there isnt one and idk how to get rid of it any suggestions?

its in src>server>model>players>packets>ClickingButtons.java

hope i helped

I went to my computer and found it for you, that is what you are looking for I believe

Read full topic
